title.rendered: THE DEFINITIVE GUIDE TO CREATING A TRAVEL + WORK + PLAY, LIFESTYLE

content.rendered:
A Lifestyle that Feels like Heaven on Earth

Soul Enchantress reveals her indulgent travel, work, play hot-list.

I created this list of my favourite destinations and getaways because my clients kept asking me where I like to play.”

— Soul Enchantress

SYDNEY, NSW, AUSTRALIA, May 24, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Soul Enchantress is the globally sought after energetic visionary, cosmic sorceress, seer, shaman, author and business speaker.

Considered a business visionary by her global business leader clients, Soul Enchantress unveils her long held dream of building a business that allowed her the freedom to create her travel, work and play lifestyle.

Her luxurious curated hot-list of decadent destinations and travel options are illustrated and described with details on why she loves to travel, work and play at those locations.

She gives the reader, a local’s insight into the nooks and secret places she visits or indulges in at each destination.

The destinations on the list are scattered across the world, includes beautiful imagery, and she also lists opulent travel options to get to the locations.

Soul Enchantress says,

“I created this list of my favourite destinations and getaways because my clients kept asking me where I like to play.”

“For as long as I can remember I’ve wanted to build a business that allowed me to create a lifestyle that gave me the freedom to Travel, Work and Play.

Today that’s exactly what I have created for myself.

◦ I travel the world in luxury.

◦ I’ve made the world my office, which means I can work from anywhere in the world, whenever I want, with whomever I want to work with.

◦ I live in luxury with the deep ocean as my backyard.

◦ I work with some of the most powerful high-profile Business Leaders around the world.

◦ I am driven by my soul and live in a manner that’s truly authentic, deeply fulfilling and blissful.”

Soul Enchantress’ “Curated List of Decadent Destinations for the Travel, Work, Play Lifestyle“ is available on her Blog.

Plus her Sacred Wisdom Library which is subscribed to by Global Business Leaders.

Both are accessible via her website www.SoulEnchantress.com

Kerry M McDuling
McDulingPR
+61410578194 ext.
kerry@mcdulingpr.com.au

You just read:

News Provided By

May 24, 2023, 10:43 GMT


EIN Presswire’s priority is source transparency. We do not allow opaque clients, and our editors try to be careful about weeding out false and misleading content.
As a user, if you see something we have missed, please do bring it to our attention. Your help is welcome. EIN Presswire, Everyone’s Internet News Presswire,
tries to define some of the boundaries that are reasonable in today’s world. Please see our
Editorial Guidelines
for more information.
